ygData.subject: Re: Maybe some hope yet
ygData.msgSnippet: They arent going to make stuff easier they are going to make the easy stuff harder to get.. LOL.
ygData.messageBody:
They arent going to make stuff easier they are going to make the easy
stuff harder to get.. LOL.


On Thu, 9 Dec 1999, Walt Zimbeck wrote:

> From: "Walt Zimbeck" <wzimbeck@...>
>
> > Gordon "Abashi" Wrinn, Verant's Interenet Relations Manager, made a few
> > posts recently on the official EQ forums on two different subjects. Here's
> > the first bit on class specific armor:
> >
> > We are aware of some disparities regarding the difficulty of obtaining
> some
> > of the class specific armor. You should start to see improvement with the
> > next patch.
>
>
> I got this from the paladin list so I have not checked it out yet. I guess
> we only cross our fingers and hope.
>
> Yilari, 15th Cleric of Tunare
> Blades of Honor
> Erollisi Marr
